entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of snow this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
